thing.title: MakerBot TopCaps
thing.author: MaskedRetriever
thing.description: Noticed a note somewhere about the threaded rods poking out of the top of the MakerBot needing toppers, so I made one out of the Dodecahedron, which seemed like a really natural and cool-looking shape for these.Also, the cupcake.(Hopefully there'll be tons of these one day, of things like chess pieces, etc...)
